```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(billboard)

```

```{r}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |>
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(year = parse_number(year))
  
```


```{r}

x |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  distinct(artist) |> 
  summarize(distinct_artists = n())

```
